entry.title: SMOG WARNING , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches near the river this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:31 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:31 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
